summary: After Fanny's boyfriend leaves her and sails away, she finds out she's pregnant.
cast: Raimu|Pierre Fresnay|Orane Demazis|Fernand Charpin|Auguste Mouriès|Robert Vattier|Marcel Maupi|Alida Rouffe|Milly Mathis|Odette Roger|Louis Boulle|Édouard Delmont|André Gide|Pierre Prévert|Annie Toinon
title: Fanny
